team_cards.n1: July 20th - {{player|PIGGY|flag=kr|pos=tank}} leaves the team. {{player|GA9A|flag=cn|pos=tank}} joins the team. <ref name="piggy leaves">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/GZCharge/status/1681982380473561089|title=Today we sadly say farewell to Piggy|publisher='''[[Guangzhou Charge]]'''|date=2023-07-20}}</ref><ref name="GA9A joins">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/GZCharge/status/1681997391979790336|title=The roots of Chinese Overwatch run deep in our team, its countless stars making up part of both our history and our future.|publisher='''[[Guangzhou Charge]]'''|date=2023-07-20}}</ref>
team_cards.n2: July 15th - {{player|ChoiSehwan|flag=kr|pos=dps}}, ''Head Coach'' {{player|Sungwoo|flag=kr|pos=coach}}, and ''Assistant Coach'' {{player|Tydolla|flag=kr|pos=coach}} leave the team. <ref name="choisehwan leaves">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/GZCharge/status/1684035873648541696|title=It's been a long journey, but not once did this phenomenal talent stop striving towards greatness.|publisher='''[[Guangzhou Charge]]'''|date=2023-07-25}}</ref><ref name="sungwoo leaves">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/GZCharge/status/1684039587709218816|title=He's helped lead us since our very first day in the league. Our mixed debut, a stage title, to our recent resurgence.|publisher='''[[Guangzhou Charge]]'''|date=2023-07-25}}</ref><ref name="tydolla leaves">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/GZCharge/status/1684039587708952580|title=From our humble beginnings to a stint in the west, then back here to ignite our rebuild, he's experienced so much and helped so many in this league.|publisher='''[[Guangzhou Charge]]'''|date=2023-07-25}}</ref>
team_cards.n3: July 25th - {{player|JinMu|flag=cn|pos=dps}} joins the team. <ref name="jinmu joins">{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/GZCharge/status/1684043364927422464|title=As every era ends, a new one begins. Given time, your most fierce rivals can become your most steadfast allies.|publisher='''[[Guangzhou Charge]]'''|date=2023-07-25}}</ref>
